description:
11.90 fftdnoiz
Denoise frames using 3D FFT (frequency domain filtering).

The filter accepts the following options:
name: fftdnoiz

options.description: Set the noise sigma constant. This sets denoising strength. Default value is 1. Allowed range is from 0 to 30. Using very high sigma with low overlap may give blocking artifacts.
options.name: sigma

options.description: Set amount of denoising. By default all detected noise is reduced. Default value is 1. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.
options.name: amount

options.description: Set size of block in pixels, Default is 32, can be 8 to 256.
options.name: block

options.description: Set block overlap. Default is 0.5. Allowed range is from 0.2 to 0.8.
options.name: overlap

options.description: Set denoising method. Default is wiener, can also be hard.
options.name: method

options.description: Set number of previous frames to use for denoising. By default is set to 0.
options.name: prev

options.description: Set number of next frames to to use for denoising. By default is set to 0.
options.name: next

options.description: Set planes which will be filtered, by default are all available filtered except alpha.
options.name: planes
